DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Informed Consent Form Version Signed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the tissue collection and banking consent form version.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Informed Consent Form Version Signed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the version (one of a sequence of copies of a consent form, each incorporating new modifications) of the specimen informed consent formed signed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:A document explaining all relevant study information to assist the study volunteer in understanding the expectations and requirements of participation in a clinical trial. This document is presented to and signed by the study subject. (from centerwatch.com glossary)

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

Property.preferredDefinition: Version; something a little different from others of the same type; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:Signed; having a handwritten signature.

Concepts.definition: A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
